Room ID: %i
Language: %l

anonymouschat/partnerstoppeddialog:
Your partner has stopped the conversation.

anonymouschat/sendingfailed: [[ Failed to forward the message to partner. Please try again. ]]
anonymouschat/stoppingdialog:
You have stopped the conversation.

/asearch => find a new partner
command/$noimage:
Cannot find an image message.
Please send/reply to an image message when sending the command.
command/about:
Hi...!

Miki Bot: a multi-functional and multi-platform bot ready to help you!

This bot was created on December 28, 2021, and released on February 8, 2022. This bot took a long time because it was very difficult to unite the two platforms (WhatsApp and Telegram), especially since I was the only one who programmed this bot from scratch; although many features are still missing, hehe.
"Feature missing?" Yes! This bot is a continuation or the next version of Miki Bot on WhatsApp earlier.
Since highschool graduation exams starting in the next month, I have to finish this project quickly, because it's been too long (and I'm tired of coding 8-15 hours per day...)

I hope for your suggestions so that this bot can develop even better.

Thank you so much for using this bot...! Share it so it can helps more people ï¸â™¥

My contact:
- WhatsApp: wa.me/6283120034889
- Telegram: t.me/mikixbot_dev

Join the Miki Bot News Telegram channel to get the latest information about Miki Bot - t.me/mikixbot_news

Â© RiozeC (2021-2022) - facebook.com/crioze - github.com/riozec
command/addautoresponse:
Format: /addautoresponse (space) word filter | response

Example: /addautoresponse thanks | you're welcome
command/addautoresponse/duplicate: An auto-responder with that word filter already exists.
command/addgroup/done: The group has been successfully added to your groups list.
command/addgroup/limit: The maximum limit for the number of groups for Free User is 3 groups.
command/addrss:
Format: /addrss (space) RSS feed link

Example: /addrss https://www,suara,com/rss
command/addrss/done: RSS added successfully. The bot will send an update every time there is content in the RSS Feed that is updated.
command/addrss/notfeed: The link is not an RSS Feed.
command/animangachar:
Format: /animangachar (space) character name

Example: /animangachar Miki Hoshii
command/anime:
Format: /anime (space) anime name

Example: /anime Log Horizon
command/apakah/$answers:
Yes, very sure
Yes
Maybe yes
Maybe
I don't know
Maybe no
No
Impossible
command/audioonly/nomedia:
Cannot find a video/document message.
Please send/reply to a media message when sending the command.
command/audioonly/notsupported:
Document format is not supported.
Supported formats: mp4, mpeg, avi, ogv, 3gp.
command/bahasajaksel:
Format: /bahasajaksel (space) text

Example: /bahasajaksel Selamat siang, apa kabar kawan?
command/bahasapurba:
Format: /bahasapurba (space) text

Example: /bahasapurba berburu ubur ubur
command/bind/code:
Send the following code to Miki Bot using the account you want to bind with this account's registration ID.

Code expires after 1 minute.

%code
command/bind/fail:
The account is already bound with another registration ID.

To replace the registration ID of the account with the registration ID of this account, retype the /bind command by adding the word "FORCE".

Warning: The data on the registration ID in the account will be lost if there is no other account bound with the registration ID.

/bind FORCE
command/bind/force: Warning: The data on the registration ID in the account will be lost if there is no other account bound with the registration ID.
command/bind/limit: The maximum limit of the number of accounts bound for Free Users is 3 accounts.
command/boundlist/notfound:
There is no account bound with this account's registration ID.

Use the /bind command to bind another account.
command/broadcast/done:
Broadcast successfully added.

ID: %id
Image: %img
Text: %txt
command/cekresi:
Format: /cekresi (space) expedition name (space) resi number

Example: /cekresi JNT JP012345678
command/cekresi/notfound:

Please check the resi number on the website, for example cekreasi.com

command/forward:

Example:
/forward 1
/forward all

Notes:
- Reply (quote) to the message you want to forward.

Example:
/forwardgroup 1

Notes:
- Reply (quote) to the message you want to forward.
- Use the /grouplist command to find out the group number.

Result of forwarding message to %a group(s):

%s success
%f failed
%n not supported
command/forwardgroup/notfound: You have not added any groups to your groups list. Use the /addgroup command in your group to add.

To use Miki Bot, type the command name starting with the @ \ > . < / + _ = - | ~ ! ? # $ : ^ & or % symbol.

/aesthetics
%waifu
>register
+yeet
$slap

Type the command /menu to see a list of available commands.

command/menu:
The following is a list of the available command categories:

Â» Converter => Media converter.
Â» Fun => Entertainment.
Â» Downloader => File/media downloader.
Â» Information => Up-to-date information.
Â» Searching => Search engines.
Â» Tools => Other tools that may be useful.
Â» Anonymouschat => Chat with random people.
Â» Randomimage => Random image.
Â» Bots => Bot configuration and information.
Â» Shop => Miki Bot Shop.
Â» Games => Games when bored.
Â» Reaction => Bring chat to life!
Â» Multiaccount => Link accounts from different platforms!
Â» RSS => Subscribe to the RSS Feed in the chat.

Type the command /menu followed by the category name to see the available commands.

Example:
/menu game
-menu shop
%menu bot
&menu fun

Feel free to try them all!
command/menu/anonymouschat:
âŸ¨ ANONYMOUS CHAT âŸ©
The commands below will start or stop an Anonymous Chat session.

Anonymous Chat (also known as Blind Chat) is a messaging system that connects two random people so that they can exchange messages without knowing each other.

What's interesting about Anonymous Chat on Miki Bot is that users can connect with partners from different applications/platforms.

/asearch
Â» Find a partner and start an Anonymous Chat session.

/astop
Â» Stop the partner searching process or stop an ongoing Anonymous Chat session.

/anext
Â» Combination of /astop and /asearch. Stop an ongoing Anonymous Chat session then find a new partner and start a new Anonymous Chat session.
command/menu/bot:
âŸ¨ BOT âŸ©
The commands below related to bot information, configuration and behavior.

/about
Â» Shows the bot's about.

/contacts
Â» Displays Miki Bot contacts.

/delete
Â» Delete a message sent by the bot. Reply to the message the bot sent to delete it.

/register <name: text>
Â» Register to the bot database. After registration, you will get an ID. All data will be saved to the registration ID. You can bind it with another account and sync all data; also forward messages to your other accounts.
Â» Example: /register Rioze

/registergroup
Â» Create an ID for the group. If you are the owner of a group, you can add the group to your list of groups; and you can forward messages to your other groups.

/getgroupid
/getuserid
Â» Displays the registration ID of the user or group.

/start
Â» Start using Miki Bot.

/help
Â» Guide to using Miki Bot.

/menu <category: text>
Â» List of all Miki Bot commands.
Â» Example: /menu game

/myprofile
Â» View your profile; such as name, registration date and premium status.

/groupstatus
Â» Displays group registration information; such as registration date and ID.

/setlanguage <language: languagecode>
Â» Change the language Miki Bot uses.
Â» Example: /setlanguage en

/languages
Â» Displays a list of available languages and language codes.

/setname <name: text>
Â» Change your name.
Â» Example: /setname Rioze

/setadminonly
Â» Enable/disable admin-only mode so only admins can use bot.

/addautoresponse <filter: text> | <response: text>
/autoresponselist
/deleteautoresponse <filter: number>
Â» Add, remove, or view a list of auto-responders in a chat.
Â» Every time someone types a word that has been added to the filter, bot will reply by sending a predefined response text.
Â» Example: /addautoresponse thank you | you're welcome

/report <error: error code>
Â» Report the error code to Miki Bot admin.
Â» Example: /report 1A2B3C4D5E
command/menu/converter:
âŸ¨ CONVERTER âŸ©
Below command is used to convert a media to another media.

/audioonly
Â» Extract audio from a video message.

/sticker <name: text>
Â» Turn a picture, video or GIF message into a sticker.
Â» Note: This command only works well on WhatsApp; You cannot save stickers created on Telegram.
Â» Example: /sticker mine

/unstickers
Â» Converts a sticker into image or GIF.

The commands below are used to provide certain information; usually up-to-date information.

command/menu/multiaccount:
âŸ¨ MULTI-ACCOUNT âŸ©
The commands below are used to bind your accounts or groups from different platforms; and forward messages to any or all of the bound accounts or groups.

/bind
Â» Bind your other account with your current account registration ID.

/unbind
Â» Unbind your account with the current registration ID. It's basically like re-registration (creating a new registration ID); so it can be used to reset data.

/boundlist
Â» Displays a list of accounts bound with your registration ID.

/addgroup
Â» Adds the current group to your groups list, if you are the owner of the group.

/deletegroup
Â» Delete the current group from your groups list.

/grouplist
Â» Displays a list of your groups.

/forward <account: number/"all">
Â» Forward the replied/quoted message to any or all of your accounts; even if different platforms.
Â» Note: Use the /boundlist command to find the account number.
" Example:
- /forward 2
- /forward all

/forwardgroup <group: number/"all">
Â» Forward the replied/quoted message to any or all of your groups; even if different platforms.
Â» Note: Use the /grouplist command to find the group number.
" Example:
- /forwardgroup 2
- /forwardgroup all

command/menu/rss:
âŸ¨ RSS FEED âŸ©
The commands below are used to configure RSS Feed links.

RSS Feed is a service provided by a website to deliver its latest content to subscribers for free; similar to an email subscription, but without the first registration process, just enter the RSS Feed link for the site.

Miki Bot will check for content updates every 5 minutes. If there is new content, Miki Bot will send it to you.

This feature requires Premium User. If it's in a group, only admins can access it.

Please note, this feature is still experimental. If you find a bug or error, please report it immediately to Miki Bot admin to fix it.

/addrss
Â» Add a RSS Feed link.

/deleterss <rss: number>
Â» Remove a RSS Feed link.
Â» Note: Use the /rsslist command to find the RSS Feed number.
Â» Example: /deleterss 1

/rsslist
Â» Displays a list of RSS Feed links.
command/menu/searching:
âŸ¨ SEARCH ENGINE âŸ©
The command below is used to search for something on the internet from various sources.

Note: Commands that marked with "{limit}" will consume 1 point of your limit.

/google <query: text>
/youtube <query: text>
/spotify <query: text>
/playstore <query: text>
Â» Example: /google egg prices

/whatanime {limit}
/whatmanga {limit}
Â» Detects an anime scene or manga page on an image and searches for its title.

/anime <title: text>
/animangachar <name: text>
/manga <title: text>
Â» Provides information about the anime, manga, or anime/manga character you are looking for.
Â» Example: /anime log horizon

/pubgusername <id: number>
/ffusername <id: number>
/mlusername <id: number> <serverid: number>
Â» Displays the player's username based on the given ID number.
Â» Example: /mlusername 12345678 9876

/heroml <hero: text>
Â» Provides information about Mobile Legends heroes.
Â» Example: /heroml layla

/osu <username: text>
Â» Provides information about an Osu! player.
Â» Example: /osu xxhonorxx

/pinterest <query: text>
/googleimage <query: text>
Â» Sends one of the image search results randomly.
Â» Example: /pinterest aesthetic

/urbandictionary <word: text>
Â» Find the definition of a word from the Urban Dictionary.
Â» Example: /urbandictionary bob

/lyrics <song: text>
Â» Search for song lyrics.
Â» Example: /lyric sugar maroon

/chord <song: text>
Â» Search for guitar chords/keys of a song.
Â» Example: /chord sugar maroon

/gsmarena <device: text>
Â» Looking for information about a device specifications from GSMArena.
Â» Example: /gsmarena poco x3 pro


âŸ©âŸ© INDONESIAN COMMANDS

/kusonime <judul: teks/link> {limit}
/otakudesu <judul: teks/link> {limit}
/lk21 <kueri: teks> {limit}
Â» Mencari anime atau film dan memberikan link download-nya.
Â» Contoh: /lk21 interstellar

/katabijak <kata: teks>
Â» Memberikan kata bijak yang berisi kata yang diberikan.
Â» Contoh: /katabijak malas

/kbbi <kata: teks>
Â» Mencari definisi/makna kata dalam Kamus Besar Bahasa Indonesia.
Â» Contoh: /kbbi cendana

The commands below are other tools that may be useful.

Note: Commands that marked with "{limit}" will consume 1 point of your limit.

/bypassOuO <link: text> {limit}
/bypassMirroredTo <link: text> {limit}
Â» Get URL from shortlink or mirror.
Â» Example: /bypassouo https://ouo,io/abCDeF

/ocr {limit}
Â» Recognizes text in an image and sends it as plain text; extract text from image.

/lowercase <text>
/uppercase <text>
Â» Converts each letter in the text to uppercase or lowercase.
Â» Example: /lowercase THIS TEXT

/reversetext <text>
Â» Reverse the order of each letter in the text.
Â» Example: /reversetext txetesrever

/ipaddress <ip: text>
Â» Find information about public IP addresses.

command/pricing:
Guide on how to order Premium:

1. If not, register first using the /register command; then get the registration ID with the /getuserid command.
2. Contact Miki Bot admin and order Premium according to your desire.
3. After agreement, make payment.
4. Provide your registration ID to Miki Bot admin to process.
5. Done, your account is Premium. Don't forget to save your proof of payment.

Thank you very much for supporting Miki Bot. Only you - the beloved Miki Bot user - can keep Miki Bot active and growing â™¥
command/register:
Format: /register (space) name

Example: /register Rioze

Note: Name cannot be longer than 25 characters.
command/register/done:
Registration success.

Name: %name
ID: %id
Registration date: %date
command/registergroup/done:
Successful group registration.

ID: %id
Registration date: %date
command/report/done: The error has been reported to the Miki Bot admin. Thank you for your participation!
command/report/notfound: Error code not found. Maybe it's been too long. Contact the Miki Bot admin if there is a problem.
command/rss/duplicate: The RSS Feed link is already added.
command/rsslist/notfound:
There is no RSS in this chat.
Use the /addRSS command to add.
command/setadminonly/off:
Admin-only has been turned off. Now bot can be used by everyone in this group.

/setadminonly => Enable it again
command/setadminonly/on:
Admin-only has been turned on. Now bot can only be used by the admins of this group.

/setadminonly => Disable it again
command/setlanguage:
Format: /setlanguage (space) language code

Example: /setlanguage en

Note: Language code is 2 or more letters that have been agreed to represent a language. For example "id" for Indonesian or "en" for English.

Use the /languages command to view the list of languages supported by Miki Bot.
command/setname:
Format: /setname (space) name

Example: /setname Rioze

Note: Name cannot be longer than 25 characters.
command/setpremiumuser:
Format: /setpremiumuser (space) ID (space) level (space) duration

Example: /setpremiumuser WA#628XXXX 2 3d

Notes:
- Levels are premium type. Level 0 is Free User, level 1 is Premium Lite, and level 2 is Premium Xtreme.
- Duration can be omitted if level is 0.
- Add a "+" sign in front of the duration (example: +3d) to extend the duration of the remaining duration when the command is executed.
- Add the letter "d" at the end of the duration (example: 3d) to convert it to days. Otherwise, the duration will be calculated in milliseconds (1 second = 1000 milliseconds).
command/setpremiumuser/done:
Successfully changed user status %id to %lvl.

Premium will end on %date
command/simsimi/error:
Oops! Simsimi is currently unreachable >_<

(Error code: %err)
command/simsimi/off:
Talking with Simsimi mode has been disabled.

/simsimi => Activate Simsimi mode
command/simsimi/on:
Talking with Simsimi mode has been activated.

/simsimi => Turn off the Simsimi mode
command/simsimi/texttoolong:
The text is too long...! (@_@)
Simi can't read!!!
command/spotify:
Format: /spotify (space) search query

Example: /spotify Fuyu Biyori
command/start:
Hi there...!
My name is Miki; a multi-functional and multi-platform bot ready to help you!

Starting from making friends through the cross-platform Anonymous Chat feature, sending messages from your Telegram account to your WhatsApp account, downloading TikTok videos, to playing games; type /help to see all my features!

Join the Miki Bot News Telegram channel to get the latest information about Miki Bot - t.me/mikixbot_news
command/sticker/documentnotsupported:
Document format is not supported.

Supported formats: jpg, png, gif, mp4, webp, mpeg, avi, ogv, webm, 3gp.
command/sticker/nomedia:
Cannot find an image/video/document message.
Please send/reply to a media message when sending the command.
command/sticker/sizetoolarge: The file size is too large. Maximum 1.5 MB.

Example: /tiktokaudio https://vt,tiktok,com/ZSwWCk5o/

Example: /tiktokaudio2 https://vt,tiktok,com/ZSwWCk5o/

Example: /tiktokvideo2 https://vt,tiktok,com/ZSwWCk5o/
command/tiktokvideonowm:

Format: /twittervideo (space) link to a video post on Twitter

Example: /twittervideo https://twitter,com/someuser/status/1487400137777627137

%name (@%usrname)
%date
%capt

Select the resolution you want to download:
%res
/cancel => cancel this dialog

Retype the command /unbind by adding the word "FORCE" to confirm.

/unbind FORCE

Your new registration ID: %new

permission/adminonly: This command can only be executed by the group administrator.
permission/devonly: This command can only be executed by the developer.
permission/grouponly: This feature can only be used in group chat.
permission/owneronly: This command can only be executed by the creator of this group.
permission/premiumonly:
This command can only be used by Premium users.

For more info, see /pricing.
permission/privateonly: This feature can only be used in private chat.
permission/registeredgrouponly:
This group is not registered yet.
Use the /registergroup command for registration.
permission/registeredonly:
To access this command, you have to register first.

Type /register (space) name.
Example: /register miki

Tip: If you have another account already registered, you can bind that account with this account by sending the /bind command from that account.
rss/fail:
RSS %link could not be accessed in the last 1 day.

RSS has been removed from the server. Use the /addRSS command to add a new RSS.

Error: %err
system/error:
An error was occured.

Error code: %e
system/migratedchatid:
The group ID has changed.
Please re-register the group or contact the Miki Bot admin to transfer data from the old group ID.
user/cdcommandreached:
Hi, %lvl!
Please delay for %dur second(s) before starting a new command.
user/freeusercdcommandreached:
Hi, %lvl!
Please delay for %dur second(s) before starting a new command.

To remove the delay time and enjoy other premium features, see /pricing.
user/inanothersession:
You are in an unfinished "%session" dialog.
Finish or cancel the dialog before starting a new one.
user/limitnotice:
Your remaining limit: %lim

You will not be able to use certain commands if the limit runs out. The limit will be reset every 00:00 UTC+0. Remove the limit by buying premium (see /pricing).
user/limitreached:
Your daily command usage limit has expired.
Be a premium user to enjoy unlimited limits. See /pricing for details.
